content: sandra s cabled headband yarn #5 chunky yarn 12 st/4 in needles 6 mm this pattern is based on the six-stitch cable pattern cast on 18 stitches row 1 k3 p1 k2 p6 k2 p1 k3 row 2 k4 p2 k6 p2 k4 row 3 k3 p1 k2 p6 k2 p1 k3 row 4 k4 p2 k6 p2 k4 row 5 k3 p1 k2 p6 k2 p1 k3 row 6 k4 p2 put next 3 stitches on cable needle and hold in back knit next 3 stitches then knit the 3 stitches from the cable needle p2 k4 row 7 k3 p1 k2 p6 k2 p1 k3 row 8 k4 p2 k6 p2 k4 these 8 row form the pattern repeat the 8 row pattern 12 times for 96 row in total cast off 18 stitches sew up the back seam if you like a looser headband add one more 8 row pattern enjoy janet longaphie 6cairns
